sentence: The staff were all friendly and helpful

Great Staff Great Location Average Facility
The valet service was very helpful from parking our car driving us for free down into Oakland and getting us a limo when we were leaving for the airport
very Nice staff including Ime who was helpful and serviceminded
Customer service was exelent especially Ime at the front desk who was very friendly and accommodating with all our needs
The location was nice the staff very friendly welcoming and polite
The staff was wonderful very accommodating
Great service and views here
Nice valet service too
The only downsides are that the hotel does not have a laundry room but they do have a laundry service if that floats your goats and that room service for food is extremely pricy
We called the front desk because we could hear our next door neighbors TVBreakfast was a little sketchy you had to walk up to order no table service

The staff was kinda helpful saying that they would try to get me in my room before the now absurd new 4 pm check in time but it was all lip service my room was n’t ready until 430 to then get into this room that took so long to clean and it was half way done bogers from someone who snoted on the wall were left beside the bed and the whole cleaning of the room did n’t have much effort for it to have taken 6 hours to clean because checkout for me was the maids banging on my door to get out the next morning at 9 am just ludicrous this place has some nerve charging me 80 a quarter of a night I ’m about done with bokingcom
The on site restaurant was horrible in service only as nobody served us at all in the free seating bar area
Not how we wish to remember the USThe receptionist who checked us in was delightful
Run by an inexperienced staff
